record.title: ORDER FOR PRINTING OF TRIBUTES AND STATEMENTS
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR PRINTING OF TRIBUTES AND STATEMENTS -- (Senate - July 13, 2007)

[Page: S9226]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that a collection of statements made in tribute to the late First Lady of the United States, Lady Bird Johnson, together with appropriate illustrations and other materials relating to her death, be printed.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
